snippet.textDisplay: Back in 97/98 there were 5 games people couldn't stop playing. FF VII, Metal Gear Solid, Goldeneye 007, The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time & Half-Life. Amazing how Sony & Nintendo managed to split the best games of those years.
snippet.textOriginal: Back in 97/98 there were 5 games people couldn't stop playing. FF VII, Metal Gear Solid, Goldeneye 007, The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time & Half-Life. Amazing how Sony & Nintendo managed to split the best games of those years.

snippet.textDisplay: I love this game. However the beauty of final fantasy was it's story lines and reading not hearing.  Where people now may see that as boring a lot of us loved it. It was like reading a interactive book. And it was strategy. The remake looks great. Very flashy and I hope people enjoy it. I would love for a new old school final fantasy.  The series died with Final Fantasy 9 in my world.
snippet.textOriginal: I love this game. However the beauty of final fantasy was it's story lines and reading not hearing.  Where people now may see that as boring a lot of us loved it. It was like reading a interactive book. And it was strategy. The remake looks great. Very flashy and I hope people enjoy it. I would love for a new old school final fantasy.  The series died with Final Fantasy 9 in my world.
